mapper.select: select node.id from alf_node node join alf_transaction txn on (node.transaction_id = txn.id) where node.type_qname_id = #{typeQNameId} and commit_time_ms < #{maxCommitTime}
select id from alf_transaction where not exists ( select 1 from alf_node node where node.transaction_id = alf_transaction.id ) and commit_time_ms <= #{maxCommitTime}

select node.id as id, store.protocol as protocol, store.identifier as identifier, node.uuid as uuid from alf_node_aspects na join alf_node node on (na.node_id = node.id) left join alf_store store on (store.id = node.store_id) where na.node_id >= #{idOne} and na.node_id < #{idTwo} and na.qname_id in #{item} order by node.id ASC limit #{maxResults}
